message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on a high-quality item that's worth every penny.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $9500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $8750?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $8200, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to go up to $8200. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for less than $9000. Would you be willing to meet me at $8900?
I'm getting close to my budget limit, but I'm not willing to go above $8500. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for less than $9000. Would you be willing to meet me at $8950?

I'm really close to my budget limit, but I'm not willing to go above $8500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be honest, I'm starting to get a bit skeptical about the value of the product at this price. Can you meet me at $8500 or I'll have to walk away?
